scripts.build: npm run build --workspace utils && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace utils && npm run build --workspace vizij && npm run build --workspace @vizij/animation-react && npm run build --workspace @vizij/node-graph-react && npm run build --workspace @vizij/config && npm run build --workspace @vizij/rig
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace vizij-website && npm run build --workspace vizij-node-graph-editor && npm run build --workspace demo-animation-studio && npm run build --workspace demo-animation && npm run build --workspace demo-graph && npm run build --workspace demo-animation-graph
scripts.build:animation: npm run build --workspace @vizij/animation-react && npm run build --workspace demo-animation-studio
scripts.build:graph: npm run build --workspace @vizij/node-graph-react && npm run build --workspace vizij-node-graph-editor
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present && npm --prefix packages/render run clean && npm --prefix packages/utils run clean
scripts.reset: node -e "const {execSync}=require('node:child_process'); execSync('rm -rf node_modules'); execSync('find apps -maxdepth 2 -name node_modules -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} +'); execSync('find packages -maxdepth 3 -name node_modules -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} +'); execSync('find . -type d -name .vite -prune -exec rm -rf {} +'); try{execSync('test -f package-lock.json')&&execSync('npm ci',{stdio:'inherit'})}catch(e){execSync('npm install --package-lock-only',{stdio:'inherit'});execSync('npm ci',{stdio:'inherit'})}"
